item.title: 罗德-斯图尔特（Rod Stewart）说，写歌是一件 "痛苦 "的事。他最近与 Jools Holland 合作发行了一张摇摆乐和大乐队翻唱专辑。
item.description:
Rod Stewart says it can be "agony" to write songs. He recently released an album of swing and big band covers with Jools Holland. pic.twitter.com/Ro7wXfYigR

— AP Entertainment (@APEntertainment) March 1, 2024

item.title: 俄罗斯反对派领袖阿列克谢-纳瓦尔尼周五在莫斯科下葬。数千人参加了他的葬礼，现场警力森严。请听一些悼念者的发言。
item.description:
Russian opposition leader Alexei Navalny was buried in Moscow on Friday. His funeral proceedings were attended by thousands, and under a heavy police presence. Hear from some of the mourners. pic.twitter.com/bMBhgDB9jM

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 1, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：五角大楼官员告诉美联社，在日本附近发生致命坠机事故造成八名军人死亡三个月后，五角大楼将于下周解除对 V-22 鱼鹰战斗机的飞行禁令。
item.description:
BREAKING: The Pentagon will lift a ban on flights by the V-22 Osprey next week, three months after a fatal crash near Japan killed eight service members, officials tell the AP. https://t.co/wNVQ6YZ5Gi

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 1, 2024

item.title: 在杜克大学，篮球是纪念附近儿童医院病人的背景。谢耶尔家族儿童队长计划 "正在起步阶段，"卡梅隆疯子 "们为之欢呼的不仅仅是篮筐。
item.description:
At Duke, basketball offers a backdrop to honor patients of the nearby children’s hospital. The Scheyer Family Kid Captain Program is in its infancy, one that has the “Cameron Crazies” cheering for more than just buckets.

Story by @aaronbeardaphttps://t.co/26kYAseZE0 pic.twitter.com/bG7SRJgXT7

— AP Sports (@AP_Sports) March 1, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：美国总统拜登宣布，美国将开始向加沙空投人道主义援助物资，一天前，115名巴勒斯坦人在援助车队周围被杀害。
item.description:
BREAKING: The U.S. will begin air-dropping humanitarian aid into Gaza, President Biden announces one day after 115 Palestinians were killed around an aid convoy. https://t.co/abwENjZCs9

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 1, 2024

item.title: 辛迪-劳珀（Cyndi Lauper）解释了她是如何看到抗议标语上提到她的名曲《女孩只想开心》（Girls Just Want To Have Fun），从而推动了她为妇女健康所做的工作。
item.description:
Cyndi Lauper explains how seeing protest signs referencing her hit "Girls Just Want To Have Fun" prompted her work on behalf of women's health. pic.twitter.com/lJFLX6XMfE

— AP Entertainment (@APEntertainment) March 1, 2024

item.title: 海伦-米伦（Helen Mirren）说，《芭比娃娃》的成功将对好莱坞制片厂负责人和有抱负的女性电影人产生持久的影响。格蕾塔-葛韦格（Greta Gerwig）的这部热门喜剧获得了八项奥斯卡提名。
item.description:
Helen Mirren says the success of "Barbie" will have a lasting impact on Hollywood studio chiefs — and aspiring female filmmakers. Greta Gerwig's hit comedy is nominated for eight Oscars. pic.twitter.com/miVWZfW6vb

— AP Entertainment (@APEntertainment) March 1, 2024
